text: cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa xo brrda phu di rab khamphir thanghlay phwk than midi tahni titeiyn læa ptiseth phwk rea (pheraa xun dı) nxkcak wa phwk rea sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa sing thi thuk prathan lng ma kæ rea læa sing thi thuk prathan lng ma kxn læw theanan læa thæcring swn mak khxng phwk than nan pen phu lameid
